content:
welcome to the official independent studentrun newspaper of Hofstra University

All tagged tv show

It was all about family in season six of the criticallyacclaimed Netflix original series Big Mouth. the new season of the raunchy adult animation was released on Oct PERIOD  and continued to put on display its comingofage story as well as its absurd and overthetop comedic prowess PERIOD

Cobra Kai the American martial arts teen drama is always a whirlwind of emotions PERIOD The best part of the fifth season is the end of the miscommunication trope found throughout the prior seasons PERIOD Created by Josh Heald Jon Hurwitz and Hayden Schlossberg the miscommunication started between the two original characters Johnny Lawrence William Zabka and Danny LaRusso Ralph Macchio PERIOD

On March  the spinoff of the critically acclaimed Netflix adult animation series Big Mouth was released titled Human Resources. its time to stop binging The Office  a new mockumentary sitcom has entered the ring and is well on its way to dominating the genre PERIOD

Season two of the critically acclaimed HBO Max exclusive TV show Euphoria has been a tumultuous ride that ended Sunday Feb PERIOD  when the finale aired PERIOD

Thunder Force is a superhero adventure comedy that emphasizes the importance of having strong bonds with friends and family PERIOD

NBCs newest series Zoeys Extraordinary Playlist premiered last month and has since become a quick hit PERIOD After being stuck in an MRI machine during an earthquake Zoey Jane Levy is gifted a power unlike any other She can hear peoples innermost thoughts through song and dance numbers which only she can see PERIOD

In March Hulu dropped The Act. this gripping true crime series is based on the life of Gypsy Rose Blanchard and the events leading up to the murder of her mother Dee Dee Blanchard PERIOD

If you dont know what to bingewatch next on Netflix Schitts Creek is the answer PERIOD

On Friday Feb PERIOD  Netflix released a new original series The Umbrella Academy based on a comic series of the same name PERIOD

The ninety-first Academy Awards remained true to its purpose of being Hollywoods biggest night PERIOD

Episode eight of RuPauls Drag Race AllStars  kept viewers on edge while the top six queens worked tirelessly to create ravishing looks with their Judys. anyone who knows me decently well knows that Im from Los Angeles PERIOD Anyone who knows me really well knows that I was born in Los Angeles and raised in Santa Clarita a sprawling citysuburb hybrid located just outside of the outer reaches of LA PERIOD

Please note that only current Hofstra students can become part of our staff writing team PERIOD

Thank you for your interest Please click here to join our Slack workspace and indicate your section preferences in the sectionjoinrequests channel PERIOD Thank you and we look forward to working with you
title: tv show — Arts and Entertainment — The Hofstra Chronicle
name: Hofstra University
